title: What happened during the black plague? - Quora

response.answer_text: The birth of Western Civilisation. That is, “How the impoverished, superstitious and ignorant people of the Dark Ages in Europe became citizens of new vital communities: Western Civilisation.” (see The birth of Western Civilisation by P Atkinson (9/2/2011))
Well basically the bubonic (black) plague is a bacterium called Yersinia pestis, it killed an estimated 25 million people. It was spread by the oriental rat flea who were in turn spread by rats.
